content: Act as a helpful AI assistant
In Julia, Write a function `keep_only_names` which iterates over the provided list of words (`words`) and removes all words that do not start with a capital letter (eg, remove "dog" but keep "Dog").

```julia
function keep_only_names(words)
    lowercase_words = map(String, words) |> lowercase
    filtered_words = filter(x -> x[1] == uppercase(x[1]), lowercase_words)
    map(String, filtered_words) |> collect
end
```
This function works by first converting the `words` to a collection of strings (`lowercase_words`) and then filtering out words that don't start with an upper case letter. The result is returned as an array of string objects.
